title.rendered: INTECH achieves new milestone in Angola

content.rendered:
O&M Safety Milestone achieved

INTECH CABGOC team achieved two major safety milestones in June 2014. The team completed 300,000 man hour services without any work related lost time injuries (LTI) and has worked more than 3000 days without observing any cases of Days Away from Work (DAFW) due to any occupational injury.

This is high class performance from a team of high caliber and safety conscious professionals. Each member of the team has contributed in achieving this milestone.

About INTECH O&M

INTECH takes responsibility of your automation assets from “Start to Finish” regardless of your choice of vendors and systems; leaving you with practical O&M solutions. Our lifecycle responsibility assures plant availability, performance, quality and safety to meet your enterprise goals. This value commitment is a key attribute that continues long after the project is completed and promises and trusted performance based relationship with all our Customers.

About INTECH                                                                                                                                                       

INTECH Process Automation Inc. is an international Control Systems engineering and Systems Integration company delivering reliable automation solutions to the Oil & Gas sector since 1991. INTECH has done projects in 31 countries across 6 continents with regional offices in 13 countries, equipping it with 2000+ engineering man-years of experience. INTECH’s vendor-neutral approach and extensive experience help serve both regional and global customers with the highest standards of quality and reliability.

INTECH covers all traditional asset classes (upstream, midstream & downstream) as well as shale and buoy automation. Its wide range of solutions covers traditional control system automation as well as hydraulic (surface and sub-surface) control system automation and advanced software solutions for operations and asset management. Customers benefit from INTECH’s lump-sum turnkey solutions to save costs and increase plant productivity.

For more Information: visit www.intechww.com
